data.comment: Today's referee, Chris Kavanagh, has blown to start the match.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea's Jorginho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 3, West Ham have a goal kick.
West Ham's Sebastian Haller is whistled for offside at Stamford Bridge.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Attention is being given to Chelsea’s Benjamin Chilwell and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Chelsea.
Declan Rice of West Ham is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 8, Benjamin Chilwell has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Benjamin Chilwell for Chelsea who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
It seems as if Benjamin Chilwell is unable to continue. Emerson replaces him for the home team.
Thiago Silva scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Mason Mount to set up the goal.
In the minute 12, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Chris Kavanagh awards West Ham a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In the minute 18, Free kick Chelsea.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 22, Can West Ham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Aaron Cresswell for West Ham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
West Ham's Tomas Soucek breaks free at Stamford Bridge. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
In the minute 29, Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a West Ham throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 33, Chris Kavanagh awards West Ham a goal kick.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
West Ham's Tomas Soucek gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Chelsea defender.
In the minute 34, West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Chelsea throw-in in West Ham's half.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Timo Werner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chelsea.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 43, Chelsea's Mason Mount gets in a shot on goal at Stamford Bridge. But the effort is unsuccessful.
West Ham's Sebastian Haller has run offside.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Stamford Bridge the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Chelsea’s Jorginho is on his feet again at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 45, Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chelsea's half?
Throw-in Chelsea.
Throw-in for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Jorginho, who is grimacing with pain.
The second-half is underway at Stamford Bridge.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In London, Sebastian Haller (West Ham) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 51, Lukasz Fabianski is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
West Ham's Lukasz Fabianski is back in action after a slight knock.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for West Ham, close to Chelsea's area.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Chris Kavanagh signals a Chelsea throw-in in West Ham's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 58, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to West Ham.
Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of West Ham.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Chelsea have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in London.
In the minute 62, Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 63, Thiago Silva (Chelsea) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
West Ham have a goal kick.
West Ham drive upfield and Pablo Fornals gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Chelsea defender.
In the minute 66, West Ham drive forward but Sebastian Haller is judged offside.
Mateo Kovacic is on a sub for Jorginho for Chelsea.
Said Benrahma is replacing Pablo Fornals for West Ham at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 72, Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for West Ham in London.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Chelsea have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 77, Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Chelsea, close to West Ham's area.
Goal! Tammy Abraham extends Chelsea's lead to 2-0.
Timo Werner instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 80, Chelsea drives forward and Christian Pulisic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Chelsea extend their lead to 3-0 through Tammy Abraham.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Chelsea.
In the minute 83, Kai Havertz is replacing Christian Pulisic for the home team.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Chelsea.
Timo Werner (Chelsea) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 89, Chris Kavanagh awards West Ham a goal kick.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-0.
The away team have replaced Jarrod Bowen with Ryan Fredericks. This is the second substitution made today by David Moyes.
